events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but it doesn't fit and I would like to request a refund.
The reported issue has been classified under the Refund cluster as the customer requests money back.
Assigning the refund request case to agent Sarah M. for further assistance and follow-up.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request for the jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in original packaging?
My order number is 453782, and yes, the jacket is unused and still in the original packaging as received.
Thank you for the info. I have initiated your refund process and you will receive the amount back within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for your quick help! I appreciate the smooth process and look forward to receiving my refund soon.
The refund request case has been marked as resolved since the refund procedure is now in progress.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Closing this case as the customer has confirmed receipt of the refund and no further action is required.
